sn16.3:1.3: apakasseva kayam, apakassa cittam, niccanavaka kulesu appagabbha.
sn16.3:1.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso jarudapanam va olokeyya pabbatavisamam va nadividuggam va—
sn16.3:1.6: evameva kho, bhikkhave, candupama kulani upasankamatha—
sn16.3:1.7: apakasseva kayam, apakassa cittam, niccanavaka kulesu appagabbha.
sn16.3:2.2: apakasseva kayam, apakassa cittam, niccanavako kulesu appagabbho.
sn16.3:2.5: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma bhagavamnettika bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu vata, bhante, bhagavantamyeva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
sn16.3:3.1: Atha kho bhagava akase panim calesi.
sn16.3:3.2: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ayam akase pani na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati;
sn16.3:3.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kulani upasankamato kulesu cittam na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati:
sn16.3:3.5: yathasakena labhena attamano hoti sumano, evam paresam labhena attamano hoti sumano;
sn16.3:3.6: evarupo kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahati kulani upasankamitum.
sn16.3:4.1: Kassapassa, bhikkhave, kulani upasankamato kulesu cittam na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati:
sn16.3:4.4: evam paresam labhena attamano hoti sumano.
sn16.3:5.2: kathamrupassa bhikkhuno aparisuddha dhammadesana hoti, kathamrupassa bhikkhuno parisuddha dhammadesana hoti”ti?
sn16.3:5.3: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma bhagavamnettika bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu vata, bhante, bhagavantamyeva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
sn16.3:5.4: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
sn16.3:5.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
sn16.3:6.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evamcitto paresam dhammam deseti:
sn16.3:6.2: ‘aho vata me dhammam suneyyum, sutva ca pana dhammam pasideyyum, pasanna ca me pasannakaram kareyyun’ti;
sn16.3:6.3: evarupassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aparisuddha dhammadesana hoti.
sn16.3:7.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evamcitto paresam dhammam deseti:
sn16.3:7.2: ‘svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhiti.
sn16.3:7.3: Aho vata me dhammam suneyyum, sutva ca pana dhammam ajaneyyum, ajanitva ca pana tathattaya patipajjeyyun’ti.
sn16.3:7.4: Iti dhammasudhammatam paticca paresam dhammam deseti, karunnam paticca anuddayam paticca anukampam upadaya paresam dhammam deseti.
sn16.3:7.5: Evarupassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno parisuddha dhammadesana hoti.
sn16.3:8.1: Kassapo, bhikkhave, evamcitto paresam dhammam deseti:
sn16.3:8.2: ‘svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhiti.
sn16.3:8.3: Aho vata me dhammam suneyyum, sutva ca pana dhammam ajaneyyum, ajanitva ca pana tathattaya patipajjeyyun’ti.
sn16.3:8.4: Iti dhammasudhammatam paticca paresam dhammam deseti, karunnam paticca anuddayam paticca anukampam upadaya paresam dhammam deseti.
sn16.3:8.5: Kassapena va hi vo, bhikkhave, ovadissami yo va panassa kassapasadiso, ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattaya patipajjitabban”ti.
